attributes.action: establish a thorough and transparent investigation into the cash for access allegations  revealed by the Sunday Times and Dispatches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current response of the government to the allegations that MPs and former ministers have lobbied and were willing to lobby on behalf of private organizations and companies is inadequate.  A thorough investigation into the lobbying system and the alleged manipulation of policy undertaken by those exposed by Dispatches and the Sunday Times should be established for the sake of increasing public confidence in politicians and preventing any further abuse or misuse of MPs' influence.
